description:
Yeah, we know you're still shaking from the insane multi-media season finale of American Horror Story: Roanoke, but it's time to move ahead with the important questions. Like, what will the super-secret Season 7 of American Horror Story be about?我们知道你可能仍然沉浸在《美国恐怖故事》第六季的多季串联式结局，但是不过还有些更重要的问题没有解决。比如，第七季的《美国恐怖故事》主题会是什么呢？

Not too long after Roanoke ended, the American Horror Story twitter feed posted the following:第六季季终没多久，美恐官博就发布了这条twitter:
The monsters are all gone. #AHSRoanoke pic.twitter.com/Ikj0bblc61
— AmericanHorrorStory (@AHSFX) November 17, 2016怪物们都走了。——美国恐怖故事官博2016年   

And if you'll remember, as Pop Sugar pointed out, there was a moment in the finale where a model ship crashed to the floor and the camera gave it a hard look. Was that foreshadowing? I wouldn't put it past Ryan Murphy to drop a hint like that since he's known what Season 7 would be about for some time now. So we're calling it: Season 7 will be about a shipwreck.Pop Sugar杂志指出，在季终集里有一幕可以看到一艘现代船冲出了地板，镜头还给了一个特写。这意味着什么？之前Ryan Murphy曾经透露第七季将会讲述现代的故事。所以我们猜测，第七季的主题很可能是海难事故。

title: 《美国恐怖故事》第六季透露第七季剧透
